meanings.definition: Something that does not occur or take place.
meanings.sent1: The nonhappening of the party left everyone disappointed.
meanings.sent2: The nonhappening of the flight caused confusion among the passengers.
meanings.sent3: The nonhappening of the surprise ruined the birthday plan.
meanings.sent4: The nonhappening of the storm saved the outdoor event.
meanings.sent5: The nonhappening of the alarm clock made her late for work.

meanings.definition: A situation or event that fails to happen.
meanings.sent1: The nonhappening of the meeting led to misunderstandings.
meanings.sent2: The nonhappening of the concert disappointed the fans.
meanings.sent3: The nonhappening of the train departure made them miss the movie.
meanings.sent4: The nonhappening of the rain dance left the fields dry.
meanings.sent5: The nonhappening of the sunrise delayed their morning walk.
